title: Introduction to Programming Basics
description: A beginner-friendly course covering fundamental programming concepts, syntax, and basic logic structures using a common language (e.g., Python or Java).

lessons.title: Setup and Variables
lessons.content: Install your environment and learn how to declare and assign values to different variable types.

lessons.title: Conditional Logic and Loops
lessons.content: Explore the use of 'if-else' statements and 'for/while' loops to control the flow of execution in your programs.

title: Advanced Responsive Web Design
description: Dive deep into modern CSS, Flexbox, Grid, and media queries to build complex, adaptive, and performant web layouts.

lessons.title: CSS Grid Mastery
lessons.content: Understanding the core concepts of CSS Grid for two-dimensional layouts and template definition.
resources: MDN Web Docs on CSS Grid

lessons.title: Performance Optimization
lessons.content: Techniques for reducing load times, optimizing images, and improving Core Web Vitals for better user experience.
